latestAction.text: On agreeing to the Northup amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 284 - 114 (Roll No. 308).

Mr. Kolbe raised a point of order against the Northup amendment (A006). Mr. Kolbe stated that the provisions of the amendment offered by Mrs. Northup constituted legislation on an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
On agreeing to the Northup amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
